text: Aspergillus amoenus is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Versicolores section. The species was first described in 1930.Roberg, M. 1930. Zwei bisher unbekannte Aspergillen. Hedwigia. 70:137-139 == References == amoenus Category:Fungi described in 1930
title: Aspergillus amoenus
